definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of caravan of travelers Ge 32:22 (J), esp. of Isr. at Exod. and in wildern. Ex 16:13, Ex 16:13, Ex 19:16, Ex 19:17 (all P; disting. fr. [[עַם]]); ´[[שַׁעַר מ]] Ex 32:26 (JE); esp. ´[[מִחוּץ המ]] in connexion with uncleanness, etc., Ex 29:14, Le 4:12 (P) + oft., of position of tent of meeting Ex 33:7, Ex 33:7 (JE), contr. Nu 2:17 (P), where of encampments of several tribes, cf. Nu 1:52, Nu 2:3, Nu 10:2, Nu 10:5, Nu 10:6, Nu 10:25 etc., (all P), already passing over to

(opp. [[מִבְחָרִים]] = fortresses) Nu 13:19.
camp of armed host Jos 6:11, Jos 6:11, Jos 6:14 (JE), 1Sa 4:3, 1Sa 4:5, 1Sa 4:6, 1Sa 4:6, 1Sa 4:7, 1Sa 17:53, 2Ki 7:16 etc.

definitions.title: b.
